nl_BE {
    LocaleID { "0813" }
    LocaleString { "nl_BE" }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "#,##0.00 \u00A4;-#,##0.00 \u00A4",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "BEL" }
    localPatternChars { "GyMdkHmsSEDFwWahKzZ" }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimeElements:intvector{
                    2,
                    1,
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "H.mm' u. 'z",
                    "H:mm:ss z",
                    "H:mm:ss",
                    "H:mm",
                    "EEEE d MMMM yyyy",
                    "d MMMM yyyy",
                    "d-MMM-yyyy",
                    "d/MM/yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
